page.title: 12ATTITUDES(CONT)
page.content:
.....3 Million and is rising rapidly and if it continues there will be immense unemployment over 5 million. A lot of people in Toward not only fear nuclear war but a nuclear accident.This is because we are situated only 10 miles from the American Submarine Base in the Holy Loch.Therefore perhaps we have double cause for concern. There is also great concern for the starving million in the under-developed nations of the world.
However if you are reading this in a hundred years from now it will be obvious our fears have not materialised. {BY {GWEN McCROSSEN {AND ALASDAIR ANDERSON { =====================
